ResourceHeader.ResourceName: List of 1859 Great Magnetic Storm Auroral Observations

ResourceHeader.Description: List of 1859 Great Magnetic Storm Auroral Observations, also known as the Carrington Event.

InformationURL.Name: Green, J. L. and Boardsen, S. (2006). Duration and extent of the great auroral storm of 1859. Advances in space research : the official journal of the Committee on Space Research (COSPAR), 38(2), 130â€“135.
InformationURL.Description: This list of observation times and locations was complied for and used in this paper.

InformationURL.Name: GIF Movie of Carrington Event observations in both Hemispheres: Green and Boardsen (2006)
InformationURL.Description: This list of observation times and locations is used to create the movie. Orange dots visual sightings of aurora, blue dots telegraph stations whose operations where impacted.

InformationURL.Name: GIF Movie of Carrington Event observations folded into Northern Hemisphere: Green and Boardsen (2006)
InformationURL.Description: This list of observation times and locations is used to create the movie. Orange dots visual sightings of aurora, blue dots telegraph stations whose operations where impacted.
